title: Lakers are eliminated and comedian Guy Torry has thoughts
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Miami Heat as they get closer to locking down the East. Are they the favorites to come out of the East? Embiid and Giannis are chasing Jokic for the MVP. Who did enough last night to solidify their final vote? Might we see a repeat? The Lakers are eliminated from the postseason. Wait until you hear the guys go off on LA’s disappointing season. Plus, actor and comedian Guy Torry joins the show. He talks about his new docuseries “Phat Tuesdays” and how he led an all-black comedy night in the 90’s that helped launch the careers of up and coming comedians. Also, he goes in on the Lakers and has some thoughts on what to expect next season. All that and more… 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
